results.title: Effect of beta-receptor blockade on anxiety with reference to the three-systems model of phobic behavior.
results.text_hl: 14 @DISEASE_Phobic_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D010698 @@@phobic@@@ subjects were given @CHEMICAL_Propranolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011433 @@@propranolol@@@ (Inderal), @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@Tenormin@@@) and placebo in a double-blind fashion according to a repeated measurement design.

citations.NLM: Fagerström KO, Hugdahl K, Lundström N. Effect of beta-receptor blockade on anxiety with reference to the three-systems model of phobic behavior. Neuropsychobiology. 1985;13(4):187-93. PMID: 4047384
